multiplechoiceresponse.label: What are those boxes on the table?

choicegroup.choice: That's the data, silly. Not the table cells. We mean the text input boxes at the top.
Those are filters - like search boxes for each column.
Those are just spacers, for visual appearances. Try typing some letters into them.
Those are for entering new data. That gets done via the form.

div.p: The boxes are filters, so that your learners can find things quickly when the table gets large.
